评论详情: Thick, soft, warm, wash nicely and I hang them to dry. Super cute patterns!
Bought these socks for my daughter and she loves them
Love these socks! Perfect addition to my feet!
I like the feel, fit, and designs!
Ok, so soft and amazing! The colors are better in person and did I mention soft!? Not too thick which I was happy about but definitely great quality. I will buy more in the future!
They're so comfortable and adorable. I wear those first after laundry day

One of the socks clearly had snags or holes that were "repaired" with thread that doesn't match the sock, itself: beige sock, black thread...  Also, where the "reinforced" heel meets the rest of the socks is very weak and thin, as you can see by the light shining through the loose stitching.  This is how every sock is, it just shows up better on the lighter ones.  I'm doubtful these socks will hold up for long. I don't think I'd be able to wash them in any kind of washing machine without them falling apart.  They also fit very long in the foot, tight in the heel, and feel like they won't stay up.
My retro daughter absolutely loved these socks. Colors fit her 70's vibes.  They are made very nice and the fabric is soft and cozy.

评论概述: Very soft and tops stay up!
评论详情: My wife really likes these sox. The wool is very soft, the designs are cute. There is a very minimal seam on top of the toes- so no annoying seam across the end of the toes. Also, the tops stay up without cutting into the leg.
Really thin, my shoes slipped in them. But they are cute, was expecting wool.
Very cute, comfortable, fits perfectly, for my boots that are only 1/2 size big which is my preferred sizing for shoes
Love these socks. They are cute and they really comfortable.  They fit super well and retain their shape!

These socks are fun patterns and colors and keep your feet warm. I wish they were a tad bigger since I wear a size 10 shoe and they are a bit short from heel to toe but it is nearly impossible to find cute socks that fit a larger shoe size. So, I will wear them and hope they don’t slide under my heel.
Cozy, cute, and not too tight on the ankles.
Even cuter than expected and comfort and quality are great too.  I am buying more for myself and to give as gifts.
Love them, good quality

These socks are so soft and just the right amount of stretchy. The colors are just like the pictures. I’m a size 9 and they fit perfectly, not too thick but not too thin. I have bought plenty of socks online and these impressed me.
Good quality material and holds up to hiking level wear and tear.
Very nice socks!  Great quality, warm and cozy, and very attractive design. Would definitely order again!
Warm and comfy.

Ok, I admit I love socks. They are a staple in my dresser. These Socks are especially nice. I love the patterns and the feel. I’m not sure yet if I’m keeping them all for myself or adding a couple of pairs in Christmas packages. I’ll probably end up ordering more!
Very vintage looking and seem THICK!
So pretty. So soft. So warm Fit is perfect. I love these socks!
This set of socks is adorable. They aren't too thick and fit very comfortably. Cute vintage pattern and muted colors. They are so soft and made well.
Pleased with the quality.
the socks are pretty and very comfortable.
These socks are super soft! Nice colors and patterns, but most importantly Soft and Cozy!

Good value for the price (and the price is cheap so don't expect SmartWool quality). Very cute. Have survived a wash, though I hung them out to dry and did not put them to the washer. Surprisingly, they stay up, so far.
Currently wearing!! The fabric is so soft and very warm. It has good stretch. The wash doesn’t change them. Exactly like the pictures. Cutest socks for fall
These are great! They are the right weight and don't slide down, plus they are so cute. Don't hesitate.
Love these!
My daughter got these for Christmas and she loves them!! So soft and they all have different designs!
cute design, well constructed
I love these! They are so comfortable and so warm!
longer shipping time than usual but the tracking information was good and they arrived before the promised date. These socks are pretty, they fit comfortably, and they are warm!
Recibí las calcetas con diseños repetidos y no como se muestra con en la foto con 5 diseños diferentes, la calidad es buena, lástima
